channel.title: R on Vivian Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in R on Vivian Nguyen

item.title: Economic Predictors of House Incumbent Vote Share
item.description: Introduction Last week, my dive into the 2018 election results and swings confirmed that the president’s party often performs poorly in the midterms. By the 2020 House elections, the president’s party gained some of its vote share back.

item.title: Analyzing House Vote Share Swings of 2018 and 2020
item.description: Introduction This is blog post #1 in a series of analytical posts about the 2022 midterms. This post is affiliated with Gov 1347: Election Analytics, a course at Harvard University in the Government department.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: THIS IS A TSET. This is a try on the content side. # R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents.
